item.description:
SUPER EXCITING

NEWS!!!!!!

The Providence Collective just got an  AWESOME shout out from our friends at Providence Monthly in this month's issue!!!! Check it out! http://providenceonline.com/stories/Most-Eligible-Bachelors-Bachelorettes-singles-2013-Providence-Monthly,4448

They've discovered what we've always known - living in Providence and RI is awesome and meeting the people who celebrate it is great!!! It's what we do every week at the MNM!

So, in true P-Collective style, let's celebrate all that is fabulous about RI while meeting  more terrific people! The Providence Monthly Mix & Mingle party will be at The Loft at NYLO, in Warwick. It's a pretty awesome place and one you won't be sorry to know about. Trust me, you won't believe you're not in NYC!

There will be a complementary cocktail and ice breaker game (designed by CollectivePlus) for even more great prizes!

NYLO is modern and trendy with a mixed vibe of high-style, city-chic, accented with a crisp, clean and subtle nautical theme. Sounds interesting, huh? The best part is, that they have an expansive deck that sits above the Pawtuxet River, and in the summer it's a terrific place for early evening cocktails or dinner! It's truly a find and one you'll go to again!

Also, just for CollectivePlus Members, NYLO is offering a PlusPerk just for us!!!! If you've already signed up you'll get it automatically, but if you haven't yet, click here: http://www.collectiveplus.com/ or click the logo under the Sponsor's Link to the left of this page!

So come out, let's mix & mingle, and celebrate the terrific people, places and joys of living in RI!

Hope to see you there!

Please RSVP!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there with bells on! Well, probably more like the usual scarf, if it gets fancier I'll let you know!
item.name: Mix & Mingle Party with Providence Monthly!!!!
